verses.verse: Now there <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4480>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H1144><s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7027>Kish,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H22>Abiel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6872>Zeror,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1064>Bechorath,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H647>Aphiah,<s%> a <S%H1145>Benjamite,<s%> a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> of <S%H2428>power.<s%>

And he <S%H1961>had<s%> a <S%H1121>son,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> a choice young <S%H970>man,<s%> and a <S%H2896>goodly:<s%> and there was <S%H369>not<s%> among the <S%H4480>children<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H2896>goodlier<s%> <S%H376>person<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> he: from his <S%H4480>shoulders<s%> <S%H7926><s%> and <S%H4605>upward<s%> he was <S%H1364>higher<s%> than <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H860>asses<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H1>father<s%> were <S%H6>lost.<s%> And <S%H7027>Kish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4480>servants<s%> <S%H5288><s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee, and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H860>asses.<s%>

And he passed <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8031>Shalisha,<s%> but they <S%H4672>found<s%> them <S%H3808>not:<s%> then they passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8171>Shalim,<s%> and there they were <S%H369>not:<s%> and he passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H1145>Benjamites,<s%> but they <S%H4672>found<s%> them <S%H3808>not.<s%>

And when <S%H1992>they<s%> were <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6689>Zuph,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> was <S%H5973>with<s%> him, <S%H1980>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H7725>return;<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2308>leave<s%> caring <S%H4480>for<s%> the <S%H860>asses,<s%> and take <S%H1672>thought<s%> for us.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H2009>Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> there is in <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and he is an <S%H3513>honorable<s%> <S%H376>man;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H1696>saith<s%> cometh surely to <S%H935>pass:<s%> <S%H935><s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> let us <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H8033>thither;<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> he can <S%H5046>show<s%> <S%H853>us<s%> our <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5921><s%> we should <S%H1980>go.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> But, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if we <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> shall we <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H376>man?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> is <S%H235>spent<s%> in our <S%H4480>vessels,<s%> <S%H3627><s%> and there is <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H8670>present<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> have we?

And the <S%H5288>servant<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3254>again,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H4672>here<s%> at <S%H3027>hand<s%> the fourth <S%H7253>part<s%> of a <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of <S%H3701>silver:<s%> that will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H853>us<s%> our <S%H1870>way.<s%>

(Formerly <S%H6440><s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> he <S%H559>spoke,<s%> <S%H1980>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H7200>seer:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he that is <S%H3117>now<s%> called a <S%H5030>Prophet<s%> was <S%H6440>formerly<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H7200>Seer.)<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H2896>Well<s%> <S%H1697>said;<s%> <S%H1980>come,<s%> let us <S%H1980>go.<s%> So they <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was.

And as <S%H1992>they<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H4608>hill<s%> to the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> young <S%H5291>maidens<s%> going <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H7579>draw<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3426>Is<s%> the <S%H7200>seer<s%> <S%H2088>here?<s%>

And they <S%H6030>answered<s%> them, and <S%H559>said,<s%> He <S%H3426>is;<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he is <S%H6440>before<s%> you: make <S%H4116>haste<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> to the <S%H5892>city;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> there is a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3117>today<s%> in the high place: <S%H1116><s%>

As soon as ye be <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> ye shall <S%H3651>straightway<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> him, <S%H2962>before<s%> he go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the high <S%H1116>place<s%> to <S%H398>eat:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> doth <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice;<s%> and <S%H310>afterwards<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H398>eat<s%> that be <S%H7121>bidden.<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore get you <S%H5927>up;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> about this <S%H3117>time<s%> ye shall <S%H4672>find<s%> him.

And they went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and when <S%H1992>they<s%> were <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8432>into<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> them, for to go <S%H5927>up<s%> to the high <S%H1116>place.<s%>

Now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1540>told<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H854>in<s%> his <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> about this <S%H6256>time<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> thee a <S%H376>man<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H4886>anoint<s%> him to be <S%H5057>captain<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that he may <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have looked <S%H7200>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> their <S%H6818>cry<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H413>me.<s%>

And when <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6030>said<s%> unto him, <S%H2009>Behold<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thee of! this <S%H2088>same<s%> shall <S%H6113>reign<s%> over my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Then <S%H7586>Saul<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H853>to<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H8432>in<s%> the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5046>Tell<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H335>where<s%> <S%H2088><s%> the <S%H7200>seer's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> is.

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am the <S%H7200>seer:<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me unto the high <S%H1116>place;<s%> for ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> me <S%H3117>today,<s%> and <S%H1242>tomorrow<s%> I will let thee <S%H7971>go,<s%> and will <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in thine <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

And as for thine <S%H860>asses<s%> that were <S%H6>lost<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3117>ago,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H3820>mind<s%> on them; <S%H3588>for<s%> they are <S%H4672>found.<s%> And on <S%H4310>whom<s%> is <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2532>desire<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> Is it <S%H3808>not<s%> on thee, and on <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house?<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Am <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> a <S%H1145>Benjamite,<s%> of the <S%H4480>smallest<s%> <S%H6996><s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> and my <S%H4940>family<s%> the <S%H6810>least<s%> of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin?<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> then <S%H1696>speakest<s%> thou <S%H1697>so<s%> <S%H2088><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me?

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H3957>parlor,<s%> and made them <S%H5414>sit<s%> in the <S%H7218>chiefest<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> among them that were <S%H7121>bidden,<s%> <S%H1992>which<s%> were about <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H376>persons.<s%>

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H2876>cook,<s%> <S%H5414>Bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4490>portion<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> thee, of <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, <S%H7760>Set<s%> it <S%H5973>by<s%> thee.

And the <S%H2876>cook<s%> took <S%H7311>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7785>shoulder,<s%> and that which was <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, and <S%H7760>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul.<s%> And Samuel <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> that which is <S%H7604>left!<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and <S%H398>eat:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> unto this <S%H4150>time<s%> hath it been <S%H8104>kept<s%> for thee since I <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H7121>invited<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%> So <S%H7586>Saul<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And when they were come <S%H3381>down<s%> from the high <S%H4480>place<s%> <S%H1116><s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> Samuel <S%H1696>communed<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the top of the <S%H1406>house.<s%>

And they arose <S%H7925>early:<s%> and it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> about the <S%H5927>spring<s%> of the <S%H7837>day,<s%> that <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to the top of the <S%H1406>house,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6965>Up,<s%> that I may send thee <S%H7971>away.<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and they went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them, <S%H1931>he<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H2351>abroad.<s%>

And as <S%H1992>they<s%> were going <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>Bid<s%> the <S%H5288>servant<s%> pass <S%H5674>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us, (and he passed <S%H5674>on,)<s%> but stand thou <S%H5975>still<s%> <S%H859><s%> a <S%H3117>while,<s%> that I may <S%H8085>show<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>
